actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on House Oversight.
On agreeing to the House Oversight amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment authorizes $995,000 for the expenses of the Select Subcommittee on the U.S. Role in Iranian Arms Transfers to Croatia and Bosnia.
purpose: The amendment inserts a complete new text which provides for authorization of payment of $995,000 out of applicable House accounts for the expenses of the Select Subcommittee on the U.S. role in Iranian Arms Transfers to Croatia and Bosnia.
